responsibilities: Developed Pro-Search, a production-grade RAG system with constrained chain-of-thought planning and optimal multi-step retrieval.
Built specialized AI agents with a Model-Context-Protocol framework enabling context-aware application integration with 80% accuracy.
Optimized backend with multi-threading and auto-scalable servers, reducing time-to-first-token from over 10s to under 5s.
Fine-tuned 40+ LLMs (3B-70B parameters) using QLoRA and federated learning, achieving SOTA results on medical and financial datasets.
Implemented a privacy-preserving distributed training architecture, demonstrating 22% lower variance than traditional fine-tuning.
Worked with Python, PyTorch, Hugging Face, PEFT, and QLoRA in a distributed systems environment.
Optimized backend query processing for a service handling 1000+ Kubernetes pods' data, reducing response time from 8 minutes to under 1 minute.
Achieved performance gains through batching, multithreading, and caching with Redis.
Developed a dynamic query system with 27 filters and 100+ sub-filters, significantly enhancing DevOps productivity.
Migrated critical GraphQL APIs to a REST architecture, resolving user issues and improving system reliability.
Restructured the server package, reducing code duplication while achieving over 90% test coverage.
Contributed to a major open-source CNCF sandbox project using Go, Kubernetes, and Docker.
